reviews.review: Good game! But VAC bypassing is too easy, even if u have prime there are too many cheaters.
To many hacker. The Game is for free. Bad Anti-Cheat. Thats shit.
Короче,игра пушка,советую. Нервные клетки мгновенно отмирают.
its fun to play with friends
Its like a love hate thing in a toxic relationship, it fucks with you everyday and make u cry at night alot but in the end you feel tempted and come back for more bullshit. highly recommended
ta gra to gówno nie polecam graczom bez prime
Эта игра съест вашу жизнь, если понравится.
This game is awful cyka blyat
ruslar adamı deli etse de arada bir girip oynamak güzel,hele akadaslarınızla beraberseniz keyifli dakikalar yaşatır

bu oyunda öyle hileler varki amk banlanan bir tek adam bile yok banlanmama hilesi bile var amk 
zaman kaybından başka birşey değil siktiringidin zula oynayın amk hiç değil hile yok

Great way to waste your life. Met lots of people, kids and russians here. 10/10 recommended.


UPDATED: Still daed but still the king

is een goed en snel reactie spel

very nice game but need to be 18 okey but just try to play it i swear its good;)

This game is a classic FPS one. The way your skills are classified into a set of levels, you are very likely to play against people of the same skills set. However, I have experienced a lot of cheater, which is a point to improve on this game: a fast and precise way of banning cheaters.
yes, but you need a really hard improve in your anti-cheat system. something is very very poor performance with this people inside the game

This Russian Language learning game is quite impressive,already after a few games I had a rather vast comprehension of the language and its underlying culture.

A few russian fellas said my grasp was "fluent".

Protip: DA DA ,DAVAI DAVAI RUSH B MOTHERFUCKERS!
One of the most frequent phrases used by Russian CS:GO PROs,translated: Rush B,Don't STOP! - until a molotov comes and then all should stop in the tunnel for a pleasant BBQ experience.
мусорная игра , как и комюнити , на прайме или нет против тебя будет софтер 100% , хотите купить прайм , не надо не тратьте свои деньги на эту хуйну,где одни долбаёба без матерей играют
Gutes kompetetives Spiel, bei dem es wirklich mal auf Eigenleistung ankommt.

если ты не крейзи, проходи мимо
